|brand = Buffalo |model = LinkStation |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 220 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = LS220DE |page_start_date = November 27, 2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Buffalo_LinkStation_220 |series = LinkStation |type = NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6707;ARMADA 370; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = PJ4 Core |cpu1spd = 800 |is_doc = yes;800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz; |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L8006E; |flash1size = 1 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CB128M16FP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 84:AF:EC

|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, CN4 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2A, 18V, 800kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;RIchtek;RT7247CH;;1;,,, 4A, 18V, 650kHz, Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek:RT7234;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
